name: Article Cards UI Kit
description:
Effective learning tip for today: Find the right resource.

✅ Cover image variant with "aspect ratio" property

✅ Includes eight components with variants

✅ Light and dark mode

✅ Customizable & Adjustable UI kit.


Update highlights：

  • [Jul 7th 2021] Added Figma tip: Clever use of auto layout and the "0" frame
  • [Jul 2nd 2021] Added Figma tip: Fixed-aspect-ratio cover + Elements on top
  • [Jun 30th 2021] Added Figma tip: Cover image variant with "aspect ratio" property
  • [Jun 29th 2021] Added Figma tip: Customizable & Adjustable icon-box
